Landmark sales 
2019-10-24
Chinese tech giant Huawei had sold more than 200 million smartphones in 2019 till yesterday, the company announced yesterday.
The news came 64 days earlier than last year to surpass the same threshold, He Gang, head of Huawei’s mobile phone product line, said. Huawei recently launched several new 5G phones, speeding up its efforts in 5G market layout. The foldable Huawei Mate X is expected to be launched on November 15, He said. Huawei’s sales revenue rose 24.4 percent year on year to 610.8 billion yuan (US$86 billion) in the first three quarters of 2019.
